sourceText: Well done! Millions of families find that this helps.
text: Wenze kahle! Izigidi zemindeni zithola ukuthi lokhu kuyasiza.

sourceText: Millions are stressed about money because of COVID-19. It can make us feel exhausted, angry, and distracted.
text: Izigidi zikhathazeke ngemali ngenxa ye-COVID-19. Kungasenza sizizwe sikhathele, sithukuthele, futhi siphazamisekile.

sourceText: Children or teenagers asking for things can cause arguments. It can help them a lot when we involve them with family budgeting.
text: Izingane noma intsha ecela izinto ingabangela izingxabano. Kungazisiza kakhulu uma sizihilela ezinhlelweni zomndeni zesabelomali.

sourceText: For more information click below links:
text: Ukuthola imininingwane eyengeziwe chofoza izixhumanisi ezingezansi:

sourceText: What do we spend now?
text: Yini esiyisebenzisayo manje?

sourceText: Get a piece of paper (or old newspaper or a cardboard box) and a pen.
text: Thola isiqeshana sephepha (noma iphephandaba elidala noma ikhadibhodi) kanye nepeni.

sourceText: Draw pictures of all the things that you and your family spend money on each month.
text: Dweba izithombe zazo zonke izinto wena nomndeni wakho enichitha imali kuzo ngenyanga.

sourceText: Write next to each picture how much each thing costs.
text: Bhala eceleni kwesithombe ngasinye ukuthi into ngayinye ibiza malini.

sourceText: Add up how much money you have to spend each month.
text: Hlanganisa inani lemali enilisebenzisayo ngenyanga.

sourceText: Build your own budget.
text: Zakhele uhlelo lokusebenzisa imali.

sourceText: Find a bag of stones or anything with lots of bits. This is your money for the month.
text: Thola isikhwama samatshe noma okuthile okunezingcezu eziningi. Lokhu yimali yakho yenyanga.

sourceText: As a family, decide what you will spend on what, and put the stones on your picture.
text: Njengomndeni, vumelanani ukuthi yikuphi enizokusebenzisa kuphi, bese nibeka amatshe esithombeni senu.

sourceText: If you can save even a tiny amount for the future, or for an emergency â€“ it is great.
text: Uma ungakwazi ukonga ngisho noma okuncane kwekusasa, noma kwezimo eziphuthumayo - kuhle lokho.

sourceText: Talk about needs and wants.
text: Khulumani ngezidingo kanye nezimfuno.

sourceText: Needs: Which things are important or must haves for your family to survive? (like food, soap to wash hands, needs for ill or disabled family members).
text: Izidingo: Yiziphi izinto ezibalulekile noma okumele nibe nazo ukuze umndeni wakho uphile? (njengokudla, insipho yokugeza izandla, izidingo zamalungu omndeni agulayo noma akhubazekile).

sourceText: Wants: Which things are nice to have but not essential?
text: Izimfuno: Yiziphi izinto okuhle ukuba nazo kodwa ezingabalulekile?

sourceText: Discuss with your children what things you could try to spend less on as a family.
text: Xoxa nezingane zakho ukuthi yiziphi izinto eningazama ukusebenzisa imali encane kuzo njengomndeni.

sourceText: A budget is how we decide what we will spend our money on, even in stressful times.
text: Isabelomali yindlela esinquma ukuthi sizoyisebenziselani imali yethu, nangezikhathi ezinzima.

sourceText: Making a budget together helps children understand that we all need to make hard decisions in difficult times.
text: Ukwenza isabelomali ndawonye kusiza izingane ukuba ziqonde ukuthi sonke kumele sithathe izinqumo ezinzima ngezikhathi ezinzima.

sourceText: It also helps families to have enough at the end of the month, and borrow less.
text: Kubuye kusize imindeni ukuba ibe nokwanele ekupheleni kwenyanga, futhi baboleke kancane.

sourceText: Your government may be giving money, or food parcels to families during COVID-19.
text: Uhulumeni wakho kungenzeka ukuba uphana ngemali, noma amaphasela okudla emindenini ngesikhathi se-COVID-19.

sourceText: Ask about whether places in your community are giving support.
text: Buza ukuthi ingabe izindawo emphakathini wakho ziyanikeza yini ukweseka.

sourceText: There may be help you can get.
text: Kungaba nosizo ongaluthola.

sourceText: Involve children and teens in making a family budget.
text: Hilela izingane nentsha ekwenzeni isabelomali somndeni.

text: amacebiso avela kwa-WHO
